Calculate root growth factor (0-1) for each soil layer

sllbs - The array of soil_layer_depth (cm)

getGrowthFactor

protected static double getGrowthFactor(double mid,
                                        double pp,
                                        double k)
soil factors which decline exponentially between PP and RD (units depend on variable, same units as M (Maximum value, will use default value 1)

Parameters:
mid - The mid point value between two layers
pp - depth of top soil, or pivot point of curve (cm)
k - exponential decay rate
Returns:
The growth factor (0-1)

getGrowthFactor

protected static double getGrowthFactor(double mid,
                                        double pp,
                                        double k,
                                        double m)
soil factors which decline exponentially between PP and RD (units depend on variable, same units as M

Parameters:
mid - The mid point value between two layers
pp - depth of top soil, or pivot point of curve (cm)
k - exponential decay rate
m - Maximum value in the top PP cm of soil (units depend on variable)
Returns:
The growth factor (0-M)

getGrowthFactor

protected static String getGrowthFactor(double mid,
                                        double pp,
                                        double k,
                                        double m,
                                        int prec)
soil factors which decline exponentially between PP and RD (units depend on variable, same units as M, the output accuracy will depend on prec

Parameters:
mid - The mid point value between two layers
pp - depth of top soil, or pivot point of curve (cm)
k - exponential decay rate
m - Maximum value in the top PP cm of soil (units depend on variable)
prec - The output decimal precision (0 for no decimal part)
Returns:
The growth factor (0-M)

getGrowthFactor

protected static String getGrowthFactor(double mid,
                                        double pp,
                                        double k,
                                        int prec)
soil factors which decline exponentially between PP and RD (units depend on variable, same units as M, the output accuracy will depend on prec

Parameters:
mid - The mid point value between two layers
pp - depth of top soil, or pivot point of curve (cm)
k - exponential decay rate
prec - The output decimal precision (0 for no decimal part)
Returns:
The growth factor (0-1)

getSoilLayer

protected static ArrayList getSoilLayer(Map data)
Get soil layer data array from data holder. Only get the first soil site.

Parameters:
data - The experiment data holder
Returns:
